ygData.subject: RE: Revised? Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: i think they figure not enough people play on the test server to accurately test this large change in exp/looting rights.  therefore testing on one live server
ygData.messageBody:
i think they figure not enough people play on the test server to accurately
test this large change in exp/looting rights. therefore testing on one live
server for a short time before putting the change on all servers seems wise.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>
>
> Did they revise the patch message? It now says the group
> damage getting
> the exp only has been applied to the Fennin Ro server. Those
> bums! How
> long have we all been waiting for this change? *sigh*
>
> Laluni Songhammer, 27th level bard of E'Ci
